Viewing Service Unit Endpoint Statistics

A service unit has one or more web service endpoints.

Web service endpoints are divided into the following categories:

  • Endpoints that provide a service.

  • Endpoints that consume a service.

Received Requests, Received Replies, Received Errors, Received Dones

Sent Requests, Sent Replies, Sent Errors, Sent Dones

To view service unit endpoint statistics

  1. In the left pane, select a service assembly.

  2. In the right pane, place the pointer on an endpoint.
